Paragraph.Text: Freezon Injectors use Freezon Canisters to give large benefits to compatible machines.

TwoColumnParagraph.Left: Lancers Melters Resin Ablator Resin Liquifier
TwoColumnParagraph.Right: 28x Clear rate 2x Range 4x Rate Boost 4x Rate Boost

Paragraph.Text: Freezon can be used to boost Geothermals Power Generation 20-fold, which internally include an injection interface via Storage Hoppers, so an Injector is not needed.
